title: Tile Guru
description: Tile Guru is a casual puzzle tile-matching game that combines mental sharpness with relaxation. Spend just 10 minutes a day matching vibrant 3D tiles and finding new fruit designs while mastering strategic match flips. With its unique puzzlescapes, escalating challenges, and a serene zen-inspired color palette, this game offers a perfect blend of brain training and tranquility, making it your ideal daily escape.
